title: Point and Balance Acupuncture
author: Point; Balance
description: Acupuncture, massage, and whole-body health. We restore balance to your body through compassionate, personalized, in-depth care.
cleaned_text: Point & Balance Acupuncture and whole-body health. Restore balance to your body. Point & Balance Acupuncture and whole-body health. Restore balance to your body. Point & Balance Acupuncture and whole-body health. Restore balance to your body. We are a group of [experienced, licensed practitioners](/about/) focusing on Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) techniques, including acupuncture, massage, and cupping. We strive to improve our patients' health and well-being through compassionate, individualized, in-depth care that addresses both symptoms and underlying causes. Millions of people have relied on TCM for over 2,000 years as a safe and effective treatment for numerous medical conditions, including... ...and can help you verify your coverage. We are always happy to answer your questions and help you determine if our services are right for you. Take the first step towards balancing your body and attaining a new level of wellness - contact
